sentences.en: Ethology and Evolution on the Web. Study of human ethology, evolutionary psychology, and related fields.
sentences.cn: 行为学以及演化. 关于人类行为学 、 演化心理学以及相关领域的研究.

sentences.en: Ethology is the study of animal behavior, based in zoology.
sentences.cn: 动物行为学是基于动物学之上的研究动物行为的学科.

sentences.en: For more information about animals predicting death, ethology and related topics, please check out the links on the next page.
sentences.cn: 关于动物预测死亡的相关信息以及动物行为学和相关话题，如感兴趣请在原文的下一页进行链连。

sentences.en: In 1965 Goodall earned her Ph.D. in ethology from Cambridge University.
sentences.cn: 1965年古道尔在剑桥大学取得了动物行为学的博士学位。

sentences.en: Note the relevance of this concept to human ethology.
sentences.cn: 注意到这个概念与人类行为学的关联性.

sentences.en: On the next page, we'll delve into the world of ethology .
sentences.cn: 下面一页我们将探究一下动物行为学的世界。

sentences.en: The links below are online references for additional resources in the field of human ethology.
sentences.cn: 以下的连结为关于人类行为学此领域额外的线上参考资源.

sentences.en: The origins of ethology can be traced back to Darwin.
sentences.cn: 人种学的起源可以追溯到达尔文.

words.tran_cn: 动物行为学家；（个体）生态学研究者
动物行动学；道德体系学；个体生态学

trans.tran_cn: 动物行动学，道德体系学
trans.tran_en: the study of the behaviour of animals in their normal environment
